data.description: Copart, Inc. a technology leader and the premier online vehicle auction platform globally, with over 200 facilities located across the world, Copart links vehicle sellers to more than 750,000 buyers in over 190 countries. We believe in providing an unmatched experience, every day and everywhere, driven by our people, processes, and technology. ## SDET Internship: Build the Future of Quality with Java & Spring Boot!Ready to launch your career where coding meets quality? We're looking for enthusiastic and driven Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) Interns to embed themselves within our engineering teams. This isn't a traditional QA role—you'll be directly responsible for designing and building cutting-edge automation frameworks using industry-leading tools. If you have a passion for clean code and a relentless pursuit of software perfection, join us!---### What We're Looking For (Foundational Skills):* Programming Prowess: Proven foundational knowledge and experience in Java development (academic, project, or bootcamp), with exposure to developing applications using the Spring Boot framework.* Engineering Fundamentals: A solid grasp of Object-Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD) concepts—you know how to write simple, modular, and maintainable code.* Database Literacy: Good knowledge of SQL and the ability to interact with relational databases (like MariaDB). You understand how to verify data integrity.* Automation Mindset: A true passion for writing clean, simple, and efficient test automation code for APIs (RESTful services) and/or User Interfaces.* Analytical Rigor: The ability to convert user stories and requirements into detailed, executable test cases and scenarios.* Quality Methodologies: Understanding of modern software quality principles, including Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD).---### Bonus Skills That Will Make Your Application Stand Out:* Front-End Familiarity: Basic exposure to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like ReactJS is a plus for tackling full-stack automation challenges.* Tooling Experience: Any experience with test automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium, JUnit, TestNG, Cucumber) or version control systems like Git is highly valued.* Polyglot Potential: Exposure to other programming languages like Python for scripting or tooling is a bonus, showing a quick learning ability. #Ls-MS1 At Copart, we are focused on harnessing the power of diversity, inclusion, and collaboration. By embracing diverse perspectives, we open doors to innovation and unleash the full potential of our team. We are dedicated to fostering a workplace where everyone feels appreciated, included, and inspired to grow and contribute meaningfully.E-Verify Program Participant: Copart participates in the Department of Homeland Security U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services' E-Verify program (For U.S. applicants and employees only).
